DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety profile, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of ascending single doses of BMS-866949 in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics Study of BMS-866949 in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male 1855 Women not of child bearing potential, 1855 History of or current treatment for psychiatric illnesses, substance abuse or dependence History of a clinically significant neurological disorder (e.g., history of stroke, head trauma, etc.)
